title: AI coding assistant startup Magic closes $320M round as rival Codeium nabs $150M
content: AI coding assistant startup Magic closed a $320 million funding round, while its rival Codeium raised $150 million. Codeium's funding was led by General Catalyst and valued the company at $1.25 billion.
summary: AI coding assistant startup Magic closed a $320 million funding round, while its rival Codeium raised $150 million. Codeium's funding was led by General Catalyst and valued the company at $1.25 billion.

title: GitHub Copilot competitor Codeium raises $150M at a $1.25B valuation
content: Codeium, a startup developing an AI-powered tool to rival GitHub Copilot, has raised $150 million at a $1.25 billion valuation. The funding round was led by General Catalyst and included participation from existing investors Kleiner Perkins and Greenoaks.
summary: Codeium, a startup developing an AI-powered tool to rival GitHub Copilot, has raised $150 million at a $1.25 billion valuation. The funding round was led by General Catalyst and included participation from existing investors Kleiner Perkins and Greenoaks.

title: Claude Artifacts Becomes Generally Available to All Users
content: Anthropic has made Claude Artifacts generally available to all Claude.ai users, with tens of millions of artifacts created during the beta phase, transforming AI into collaborative workspaces.
summary: Anthropic has made Claude Artifacts generally available to all Claude.ai users, with tens of millions of artifacts created during the beta phase, transforming AI into collaborative workspaces.

title: ZedAI Multi file edits like Cursor's composer #16562 - GitHub
content: The issue discusses multi-file edits through the composer and composer control panel, an evolving feature. It mentions that the `/workflow` command can open files and suggest edits that developers can choose to apply directly to the source code. The feature is still in development and open to user feedback.
summary: The issue discusses multi-file edits through the composer and composer control panel, an evolving feature. It mentions that the `/workflow` command can open files and suggest edits that developers can choose to apply directly to the source code. The feature is still in development and open to user feedback.

title: Introducing Zed AI â€” Zed's Blog
content: Zed AI is an AI-assisted coding tool that combines a fast, thoughtfully designed editor with cutting-edge AI. It features an assistant panel and inline transformations, allowing developers to leverage language models while maintaining control over their code. The `/workflow` command is being developed to create a two-way interaction between the assistant panel and project files, enabling guided AI-assisted complex coding tasks.
summary: Zed AI is an AI-assisted coding tool that combines a fast, thoughtfully designed editor with cutting-edge AI. It features an assistant panel and inline transformations, allowing developers to leverage language models while maintaining control over their code. The `/workflow` command is being developed to create a two-way interaction between the assistant panel and project files, enabling guided AI-assisted complex coding tasks.

title: The best LLM tools for software development
content: A list of the best AI tools for software development in Aug 2024. Amazon Q Developer can predict and complete code blocks while you are programming. It is powered by Amazon Bedrock and generates code based on comments in natural language and existing code.
summary: A list of the best AI tools for software development in Aug 2024. Amazon Q Developer can predict and complete code blocks while you are programming. It is powered by Amazon Bedrock and generates code based on comments in natural language and existing code.
